attributes.action: ban the titles "Honourable" and "Right Honourable" with reference to members of parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given the recent excessive and sometimes fraudulent use of expenses, attempts to avoid taxes on homes by members of the British Parliament and their subsequent attempt to prevent such actions being found out by voting for a bill to exempt themselves from the Freedom of Information Act 2000, in no way can our elected representatives be called "Honourable" let alone "Right Honourable". As such it is only right that this or the next government introduces an act to ban the use of these titles in respect of MP's

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
